channel.title: RS-Evo Help
channel.description: I'm kind-of new to this; and I've setup No-IP & Everything; My server starts up fine, but my client isn't connecting if somebody tells me where to put the IPs. Tell me to put either: 127.0.0.1 | (my actual IP) | (my no-ip IP)

item.title: RS-Evo Help
item.dc:creator: @NexRSPS NexRSPS
item.description:
@NexRSPS wrote:

I have a client set to 127.0.0.1 [Unjarred] and I can’t connect; is there something I need to change in the server?

Read full topic

item.title: RS-Evo Help
item.dc:creator: @Haydnz1234 Haydnz1234
item.description:
@Haydnz1234 wrote:

In order for you to get on, you need a 127.0.0.1 client, and for your friends to get on, you need your no-ip client, so I;d suggest jarring a public client with the no-ip, then changing the ip’s to 127.0.0.1 and jarring it again for your use

Read full topic

item.title: RS-Evo Help
item.dc:creator: @NexRSPS NexRSPS
item.description:
@NexRSPS wrote:

It is running; I can get on skype and screenshare if you wish.
#bump

Read full topic

item.title: RS-Evo Help
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Make sure your server is running first (assuming you’re using a 718+).

Read full topic

item.title: RS-Evo Help
item.dc:creator: @NexRSPS NexRSPS
item.description:
@NexRSPS wrote:

Still gives me 0% Loading; Is there something I need to change in the server or in the client? I’m trying to host for localhost atm but won’t work.
I have skype if you guys need it.;

Read full topic

item.title: RS-Evo Help
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

No need to set it to 0.0.0.0, just use 127.0.0.1 for you to connect to it if you’re hosting the server on your computer. For others to connect, they must use your ip or no-ip.

Read full topic

item.title: RS-Evo Help
item.dc:creator: @deathbysniper97 deathbysniper97
item.description:
@deathbysniper97 wrote:

If youre making the server public, do your no-ip and make sure you portforward
Elseware, if you just want it to be for you to play and program, set your clients ip to 0.0.0.0 and compile.

Read full topic

item.title: RS-Evo Help
item.dc:creator: @NexRSPS NexRSPS
item.description:
@NexRSPS wrote:

I’m kind-of new to this; and I’ve setup No-IP & Everything; My server starts up fine, but my client isn’t connecting if somebody tells me where to put the IPs.
Tell me to put either: 127.0.0.1 | (my actual IP) | (my no-ip IP)

Read full topic
